doc:
King Kong Bundy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_Kong_Bundy 0 Christopher Alan Pallies (born November 7, 1957) is an American retired professional wrestler, stand-up comedian and actor, better known by his ring name, King Kong Bundy. Bundy is best known for his appearances in the World Wrestling Federation in the mid-1980s and mid-1990s. Bundy wrestled in the main event of WrestleMania 2 in 1986, facing Hulk Hogan in a steel cage match for the WWF World Heavyweight Championship. Christopher_Alan_Pallies ( born November_7_,_1957 ) is an_American_retired_professional_wrestler , stand-up_comedian_and_actor , better_known by his_ring_name , King_Kong_Bundy . Bundy is_best_known for his_appearances in the_World_Wrestling_Federation in the_mid-1980s_and_mid-1990s . Bundy wrestled in the_main_event of WrestleMania_2 in 1986 , facing Hulk_Hogan in a_steel_cage_match for the_WWF_World_Heavyweight_Championship .
